name: Gordian Rooms: A curious heritage Prologue
name_original: Gordian Rooms: A curious heritage Prologue
description:
Gordian Rooms: A Curious Heritage is a Victorian escape game, where you solve various puzzles in your late uncle’s mansion in the hope of obtaining his legacy.
In the prologue you can play through the first level of the game.

  • Explore a Victorian basement
  • Solve the puzzles your uncle left behind
  • Use your skills of deduction, observation, recollection and combination to succeed
  • Keep your eyes open for secrets
